introduction: Floating button normally used to perform the main action of the page.
helper: *In the lower right corner of the screen there is an example of how to be applied.

classes.name: ui-fab-container
classes.function: Used to enclose a set of FABs.

classes.name: primary
classes.function: Adds the primary system theme to the button.

classes.name: accent
classes.function: Adds the secondary system theme to the button.

classes.name: warning
classes.function: Adds an alert look to the button.

classes.name: error
classes.function: Adds an error look to the button.
